content: इष्टिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [इष्-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Wish, request, desire. {@--2@} Seeking, striving to get. {@--3@} Any desired object. {@--4@} A desired rule or desideratum; (a term used with reference to Patañjali's additions to <ls>Kātyāyana</ls>'s Vārtikas; इष्टयो भाष्यकारस्य, इति भाष्यकारेष्ट्या &c., <ab>cf.</ab> उपसंख्यान). {@--5@} Impulse, hurry. {@--6@} Invitation, order. {@--7@} (यज्-क्तिन्) A sacrifice. {@--8@} An oblation consisting of butter, food &c.
